pages.text: The $(mob)Cyberzombie$() is a rare variant of the $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombie$(). It spawns wearing random pieces of $(item)Cyberware$(), which can grant it various enhanced abilities. When killed it may drop one of its worn $(item)Cyberwares$() in salvaged quality.$(p)Its spawn rate can be increased by using a $(item)Radio Kit$() or any similar item.
